content: this beautiful modern baby blanket pattern is accessible for beginners and is a great relaxing project for makers great for using up stash yarn this pattern includes the instructions for blankets in the following sizes **stroller ** 30 x 36 **baby ** 32 x 41 25 **crib ** 41 x 61 **toddler ** 36 x 50 **please note that the baby size pattern included in this pattern is available as a free pattern containing ad on my blog all other baby sizes are exclusive to the bundle** **bigger blanket sizes for sizes small throw through king size find them for** **here** https //tidd ly/3u9dx8l **in my etsy shop ** **skill level ** beginner **language ** english **terminology ** u s terminology step-by-step video tutorial is available for the baby size on my blog **follow me on social media to see behind-the-scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb http //www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb http //www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb http //www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg **blog ** www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com mailto ashley@theloopylamb com
